The images were published on January 19: 2021, on a Facebook page called Medical Student Diaries, which has more than 500,000 followers.
The original tweet sharing the images wa: 3. A reverse image search on Google revealed that the images were doctored and actually showed a doctor in Yemen, not Pakistan.
The original photos were published on Ar: Watan on June 6, 2020, along with accurate reporting about the doctor's free mobile medical services to poor and homeless people.
